name: Selly
description: Selly.vn is currently the fastest growing social commerce platform in Vietnam. We?ve launched first version of Selly for mobile devices in March 2021 with mission to empower everyone to start an online business with zero investment. Just after 4 months, we?ve achieved a growth rate of over 150% MoM. As a result, we?ve helped over 2000 Resellers to build their own business and earning more than $25k in total on our platform.
